participant_1.name: Alex Carter
participant_1.personality: Confident and disciplined, Alex is driven by his passion for tennis and enjoys the outdoors.
participant_1.background: i'm a professional tennis player. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i live in a three storey house. my family is continuously growing.

participant_2.name: Jamie Lee
participant_2.personality: Creative and social, Jamie loves music and is always looking for opportunities to connect with others.
participant_2.background: my favourite artist is travis scott. my mother is a dentist. i'm currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant. i like playing basketball. i have one older sister.
